summary: Replace the Bethesda splash screen with a short from the Live Action trailer.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][color=#efefef][size=5]Description:[/size][/color][/u][/b][size=4]
[/size]
[color=#d0e0e3]This is barely a mod, but simply a file I created for myself to replace the Bethesda logo splash screen. I wanted the startup to the game to be more interesting and entertaining than shadowed text so I put this together. There are similar mods that do the same thing; this one is just my personally edited version. I take no credit behind the idea or material.[/color]

[color=#00ffff]Currently offered in 1920x1080 only. Notify me if you wish for other resolutions :)[/color]

[b][u][color=#efefef][size=5]Versions:[/size][/color][/u][/b]

[b][u][color=#00ffff]Original[/color][/u][/b][color=#d0e0e3] - 9.1 second long clip from the Live Action trailer. includes end scene of approaching the dragon as the dragon shouts at the Dovahkiin. Fades into a short fire effect that fades into a black screen.[/color]

[u][b][color=#00ffff]Shortened[/color][/b][/u][color=#d0e0e3] - 4 second long clip from the Live Action trailer. Same exact clip as Original except it starts at the moment the dragon lifts it's head up to shout.

Two optional versions have been added out of request. They are both the same as their corresponding main file just without the fire effect at the end (and possibly have better video quality).
[/color]
[youtube]MnM5cjeQxcM[/youtube]

[u]Installation:[/u]

[color=#00ffff][size=2]A quick and easy to follow YouTube tutorial made by CHABAL (thank you!):
[youtube]o62yGDwiPLA[/youtube]

[/size][/color]

[color=#d0e0e3]No requirements needed, just Skyrim :)![/color]
[size=2]
[/size][list=1][*][color=#d0e0e3][size=2]Download whichever version you prefer (or both!) and extract the .bik file from the folder.[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#d0e0e3][size=2]Place the file in your /Skyrim/Data/Video/ directory.[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#d0e0e3][size=2]Change the line in your skyrim.ini file under [General] to sIntroSequence=SIR.bik for original version, or sIntroSequence=SIRshort.bik for shortened version. If this line does not exist, simply add it.[/size][/color]
[/*]
[/list]
[color=#00ffff]The reason why I prefer the manual installation is because this way you can manually change which .bik is being played without having to remove the other files from your /Data/Video folder.

To uninstall, simply undo these steps.[/color]

[color=#efefef][size=5][u]Compatibility:[/u][/size][/color]

[color=#d0e0e3]Should be compatible with every single mod as it does not change anything other than the bethesda splash screen. No vanilla edits. It will obviously be incompatible with mods that change the sIntroSequence line or other splash screen replacers.

[/color][u][b][size=5]Alternatives:

[/size][/b][/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6665/?]Epic Dragon Skyrim Intro HD[/url] by MorninJerky - A similar, unedited version!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50628/?]Short Epic Intro[/url] by Everlive - a very well done 30 second version!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24618/?]Kalicolas Live Action Intro HD[/url] by kalicola - The entire Live Action trailer!

[size=5][u][color=#efefef]Credits:[/color]
[/u][/size]
[color=#d0e0e3]I do not take any credit for any of the material included in these files. I took work that was created by the bethesda team and the fire is from videotschannel on YouTube and simply combined it and edited it only.

Thank you to CHABAL for making a clear installation tutorial.[/color]

[b][u][size=5][color=#efefef]Permissions:[/color]
[/size][/u][/b]
[color=#d0e0e3]Feel free to do what you wish with the file(s) :P.[/color]
author: Pharros
